author: pderop
msg: Fixed a bug in the TemporalServiceDependencyImpl: the dynamic proxy was only injected in autoconfig fields.
Now the dyn proxy can also be injected using ServiceDependency callbacks (add/remove).
Removed the TemporalServiceDependency interface: the DependencyManager's createTemporalServiceDependency method is
now returning a ServiceDependency and takes as argument the temporal service invocation timeout. Addapted the test accordingly.
